name: .QPJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .QPJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: QPJ files are not meant to be opened by themselves. They are intended to be read by QGIS when a geographer opens a shapefile (.SHP file). However, because QPJ files are text files, you can open and edit them in any text editor if needed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
